sub_title: Founder of Donkervoort Automobielen | Design and Management Consultant
summary:
I saw a Lotus 7 when I was a child and founded my own car company so I could design and innovate with my own cars, and that passion for design and innovation has never faded. Forty years at the head of Donkervoort added valuable business experience and expertise along the way as we created the world’s most driver-focused sportscars.

Now, those passions have led me to the second phase of my professional life, the one-on-one mentoring of clients and professionals. Decades of arbitrating goal conflicts and guiding a company through difficult conditions in a cut-throat industry have positioned me to help others draw out their best design, engineering and business potential. I started Donkervoort’s spin-off Ex-Core brand and remain on the Donkervoort Advisory Board, both of which maintain my expertise in materials, design and production engineering on the cutting edge.
